import React from 'react'; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import { setPost, selectPost } from '../../redux/slices/posting'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; const nonSelectStyle = 'post-word-sub'; const selectStyle = 'post-word-sub post-word-sub-selected'; const nonSelectBg = 'post-word-sub-bg'; const SelectBg = 'post-word-sub-bg post-word-sub-bg-selected'; const PostPage1: React.FC = () => { const selected = useSelector(selectPost).leaserSchoolYear; const dispatch = useDispatch(); return ( ~Something personal will make your post more trustworthy~ {/* TODO this is what the inputs should look like */} {/* Your name setFirstName(e.target.value)} isValid={firstName.length > 0} isInvalid={firstName.length === 0} placeholder="Name" /> */} Your name dispatch(setPost(['name', event.target.value])) } />
Phone dispatch(setPost(['leaserPhone', event.target.value])) } /> School email dispatch(setPost(['leaserEmail', event.target.value])) } />
School year
dispatch(setPost(['leaserSchoolYear', 'First']))} > First
dispatch(setPost(['leaserSchoolYear', 'Sophomore'])) } > Sophomore
dispatch(setPost(['leaserSchoolYear', 'Junior'])) } > Junior
dispatch(setPost(['leaserSchoolYear', 'Senior'])) } > Senior
dispatch(setPost(['leaserSchoolYear', 'Fifth']))} > Fifth
dispatch(setPost(['leaserSchoolYear', 'Grad']))} > Grad

Major dispatch(setPost(['leaserMajor', event.target.value])) } /> ); }; export default PostPage1;
